com.netflix.paas.cassandra.provider

Interface ClusterClientProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAstyanaxClusterClientProvider

    public interface ClusterClientProvider
    Provider for cluster level client. For now the cluster level client is used mostly for admin purposes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.netflix.astyanax.Cluster acquireCluster(ClusterKey clusterName)
      Acquire a cassandra cluster by name.
      void releaseCluster(ClusterKey clusterName)
      Release a cassandra cluster that was acquired using acquireCluster

    • Method Detail

      • acquireCluster

        com.netflix.astyanax.Cluster acquireCluster(ClusterKey clusterName)
        Acquire a cassandra cluster by name. Must call releaseCluster once done. The concrete provider must implement it's own reference counting and garbage collection to shutdown Cluster clients that are not longer in use.
        Parameters:
        clusterName -

      • releaseCluster

        void releaseCluster(ClusterKey clusterName)
        Release a cassandra cluster that was acquired using acquireCluster
        Parameters:
        clusterName -
